(351)                      Sanitarium, Calif., Apr. 3, 1907. B. -120- '07. 

Elder J. A. Burden, Loma Linda, Sanitarium. 

Dear Brother, 
     There are some things that I desire to write to you. Do not be in haste about the health food business. There is a possibility of entering into a work that will bring gain of means but which would result in spiritual loss to the sanitarium. 


                              -202-
